message.body: Hi! i miss you! also I want to vent to youuu so you can tell me how to be reasonable :P the other research assistants at work know I'm in a relationship but nothing more, and two are being gender neutral and not pressing me but one (who I am most concerned about) referenced my boyfriend three times today in front of others and I didn't correct her and hfkksbdjfkshfjvk I don't know what to do help call me sometime (not urgent I'm actually fine just rambling) <3
Or girl who said boyfriend can find out because she friended me on Facebook, as opposed to my saying something on Monday? Is that weird?
Huh. I don't think you have to say anything in that case. Or you could wait to friend her until after you've talked to her.
Yeah I just friended them all on fb. I'm sure Allison will bring it up and no one else will care
Yes haha it is done. How are you? Any weekend and or just hanging around?
Pottery pottery. But also second annual north ga chamber music festival opens tonight! Yay! So excited. Going with sister. Schmann, beethoven, etc.
I'm at haverford right now but when Anna gets back from lab we will head to Philly and help Lizzy move in. Not sure about tomorrow. Also sleeping in :P
